Changelog
=========

0.1.13 (2018-01-08)
-------------------

- Enclose text of an object in details tag.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.12 (2017-12-12)
-------------------

- Accept html content for address.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.11 (2017-12-04)
-------------------

- Fix event location.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.10 (2017-04-27)
-------------------

- Fix at event date.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.9 (2017-04-27)
------------------

- Formated date for event start and end.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.8 (2017-03-24)
------------------

- Do not try to see an image on file.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.7 (2017-02-21)
------------------

- Use enclosure media type for lead image.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.6 (2016-11-16)
------------------

- Fix event rss.
  [bsuttor]


0.1.5 (2016-04-25)
------------------

- Lint README file

0.1.4 (2015-05-12)
------------------

- Modifications to get events' startdate and enddate into RSS feeds.
